content: पात्रं [पाति रक्षत्याधेयं, पिबत्यनेन वा पाष्ट्रन् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A drinking-vessel, cup, jar. {@--2@} A vessel or pot in general; पात्रे निधायार्ध्यं <ls>R. 5. 2</ls>, <ls n="R. 5.">12</ls>; any sacrificial vessel or utensil. {@--3@} A receptacle of any kind, recipient; <ls>Pt. 2. 97.</ls> {@--4@} A reservoir. {@--5@} A fit or worthy person, a person fit or worthy to receive gifts; वित्तस्य पात्रं व्ययः <ls>Bh. 2. 82</ls>; <ls>Bg. 17. 22</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 201</ls>; <ls>R. 11. 86.</ls> {@--6@} An actor, a {%dramatis%} {%persona%}; तत्प्रतिपात्रमाधीयतां यत्नः <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; उच्यतां पात्रवर्गः <ls>V. 1.</ls> {%dramatis%} {%personae%}. {@--7@} A king's minister. {@--8@} The channel or bed of a river. {@--9@} Fitness, propriety. {@--10@} An order. command. {@--11@} A leaf. --त्रः {@--1@} A kind of measure (अढक). {@--2@} A preservative from sin. --त्री {@--1@} A vessel, plate, dish {@--2@} A small furnace. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā.
